SETUP CANON PIXMA MX490 WIRELESS MANUALLY

Enter Printer Model


Canon has become a popular Japanese multinational firm that manufactures cameras, steppers & scanners, for example, with imaging and visual gadgets. The Canon Pixma MX490, therefore, is among the most popular and trendy multi-purpose printers. This is therefore an advisable printer, allowing users to perform features like write, fax, scan, and copy. Canon Pixma MX490 supports wired as well as wifi connectivity.

Canon Pixma MX490 allows consumers to follow all printing requirements. It is also lightweight and has many applications. Furthermore, the individual should hold the printer anywhere they choose, so it takes less space. Moreover, whenever it comes to power this machine is exceptionally fast.

The steps concerning the configuration guide in the canon mx490 user manual. Those that can’t perform the set-up process should read any of the steps below carefully.

Reconfiguring methods to repair canon mx490 not printing issue

If a printer with no print difficulty is encountered by the user, a Canon Pixma MX490 should be used in the mentioned steps.  This phase can be easily solved by the “printer will not print issue”.

  • Ensure the printer’s power light first blinks.
  • Then imagine the printer can be printed until it stops.
  • Link Canon Pixma MX490 automatically via a USB intercom link to the USB port of the device.
  • Affirm that the paper output tray has been opened.
  • Delete it from the computer if printing jobs are open unwanted or disabled.
  • Users can either disable the printer software and reinstall or import the driver from the CD.

Canon MX490 wifi Setup Conduct And analyze

The following steps illustrate that the user must connect the printer wirelessly with the assistance of the modem and not through the router.

  • Begin the operation by ensuring that Canon MX490 is enabled.
  • Tap the Setup icon and choose the configuration option for the Wireless Network using the arrow buttons
  • Tap the OK tab.
  • The printer then begins looking for the networks open.
  • Push the WPS button to the router. Even sustain this for a few seconds.
  • Click the OK button when OK notifications show up with the linked key.
  • To finish wireless installation, press the copy icon
  • Attributed a printing process after that and verified the link.

Pixma MX490 configuration?

With the steps below, you can conveniently set up the Canon MX490. It is recommended that all participants take the mentioned methods. The configuration process can be conveniently done with the aid of the following methods.

Note: all clients were instructed not to initiate the setup process but to fix the router up properly and to cause a network problem. Check for the connection of the device, too.

  • Insert the printer into the USB port at the beginning and switch it on. Afterward, if the printer’s green light glows, the printer would be turned ON.
  • When the display screen is switched on, push the button Copy, then obey the button set up, which is displayed on the touchscreen display of the printer.
  • Then verify the Wi-Fi Lan configuration option on the touch screen, then press OK. It will then continue to scan for various modes.
  • Click now if the alert on the display indicates the “Wifi LAN Default Configuration notification.
  • Select the Wireless configuration option in order to continue with the initial setup.
  • Then, pick the printer type, country, and language, which is Canon MX490.
  • Pick the computer and the OS after that.
  • Pick the folder for the driver file to download.
  • The downloaded document and tap Next after the installation process.
  • Then select the LAN Link Printer option and select Canon Printer MX490 Link as “Interface via Wifi Network”
  • Make absolutely sure the printer has been activated, so that you scan the attached Canon MX490 printer for installation in your system. Indeed, if you select besides the 1st time, the list is empty.
  • Click on the Cableless configuration list. On the device, the configuration guideline is shown.
  • Ensure that the networking link is disconnected for a limited time and then re-connected.
  • The method of introduction is now pending. Verify the authorization and agree subsequently to start the operation. Next, pick the Full tab until the setup is installed.

The process for setting up Pixma MX490 is then completed successfully via all these steps. You can quickly find your records and check them via fax. If the consumer doesn’t engage in the setup process or the configurations process is not completed, the printer specialists will inquire for assistance. That is advised.
